answers.answer: Sounds like stress but do check with your doc and ask him or her all of these questions, get examined, labs drawn at the right times, etc. Goodluck, EB

I HOPE YOU ARE RIGHT...EVERYTHING I HAVE BEEN TESTED FOR CAME BACK NEGATIVE...NOW I KNOW THE ONLY ONE THAT COULD BE WRONG IS THE HERPES TEST...IT TAKES UP TO THREE MONTHS FOR A POSITIVE BLOOD TEST RIGHT...BUT I HAVE ALSO READ THAT IF IN FACT YOU ARE INFECTED WITH HERPES AND YOU ARE SYMPOMATIC IT USUALLY APPERS WITHIN 2 TO 10 DAYS...IF THE SYMPTOMS I AM HAVING ARE INDEED FROM HERPES SHOULDNT I ALREADY HAVE BLISTERS?...BECAUSE I DONT...BUT I AM MAKING MYSELF SICK WORRYING ABOUT IT THATS WHY I THINK IT COULD ALL JUST BE STRESS RELATED...HOPE YOU AND I BOTH ARE RIGHT ON THAT ACCOUNT
Here for you and hang in there!! EB

question: SERIOUSLY I NEED SOME INFO HERE AGAIN HERE IS MY PROBLEM...I HAD SEX ABOUT 12 DAYS AGO WITHOUT A CONDOM...THE VERY NEXT DAY I JUST DIDNT FEEL RIGHT...DONT KNOW IF IT WAS GUILT OR WHAT...BUT NOW I AM HAVING ISSUES...I DONT KNOW IF THEY ARE JUST BECAUSE I AM STRESSED OUT SO MUCH ABOUT THIS OR WHAT...BUT ON THE HEAD OF MY PENIS EVERY NOW AND THEN THROUGH OUT THE DAY I GET THIS PINCHING SENSATION....IT IS A LITTLE RED BUT NOW REALLY THAT NOTICABLE..I TESTED NEGATIVE FOR HIV AND EVERYTHING ELSE...EVEN MY BLOOD TEST FOR THE HERPES CAME BACK NEGATIVE..IF I AM HAVING SYMPTOMS OF HERPES WOULD THE BLOOD TEST NOT HAVE COME BACK POSITIVE???..IS IT POSSIBLE THIS IS ALL IN MY MIND OR DO I HAVE ACCTUAL REASON TO BE CONCEARNED....I ALOS HAVE LOOS STOOL MAYBE CAUSED BY STRESS OR ANXIETY...COULD MY SYMPTOMS BE THAT OF DIABETES??...ANY ONE WITH USEFULL INFO PLEASE HELP
title: help please
